title: Timestamp Logger
description: Simple container that logs the current timestamp in a loop, ideal for testing CPU checkpointing.

title: CUDA Vector Addition
description: Basic CUDA workload that performs vector addition on GPU, demonstrating GPU checkpoint and restore capabilities.

title: CUDA Memory Throughput
description: CUDA workload that measures memory throughput using SAXPY operations in a loop, useful for GPU memory performance testing.

title: Simple GPU Training
description: Basic GPU training workload using StableLM model for testing GPU checkpoint and restore during training.

title: GPT-2 Transformer Inference
description: Transformer inference workload using GPT-2 model with readiness probe for testing GPU-accelerated language model checkpointing.

title: GPT-2 XL Transformer Inference
description: Large transformer inference workload using GPT-2 XL model with readiness probe for testing checkpoint and restore of large language models.

title: Mistral 7B Inference
description: Large language model inference using Mistral 7B model, requiring HuggingFace token for testing checkpoint and restore of large models.

title: StableLM Inference
description: Language model inference using StableLM 2-1.6B model with readiness probe for testing GPU checkpoint and restore capabilities.

title: Jupyter Notebook Server
description: Jupyter notebook server with token authentication, ideal for interactive development and testing checkpoint capabilities in notebook environments.

title: NGINX Web Server
description: Simple NGINX web server deployment for testing basic container checkpoint and restore functionality with web services.

title: Redis Database
description: Redis database deployment with service for testing stateful application checkpoint and restore capabilities.

title: Redis Restore Example
description: Redis deployment specifically configured for testing checkpoint and restore scenarios with multiple replicas and service configuration.
